scripts.docker:build: run-script-if --bool $([ $(command -v docker) ] && echo true || echo false) --then "docker compose build" --else "echo Docker not found, skipping image build."
scripts.docker:down: run-script-if --bool $([ $(command -v docker) ] && echo true || echo false) --then "docker compose down" --else "echo Docker not found, skipping image down."
scripts.docker:start: run-script-if --bool $([ $(command -v docker) ] && echo true || echo false) --then "docker compose up -d --wait --wait-timeout 60" --else "echo Docker not found, skipping image start."
scripts.docker:stop: run-script-if --bool $([ $(command -v docker) ] && echo true || echo false) --then "docker compose stop" --else "echo Docker not found, skipping image stop."
